text: to jab tum kaaphiron se bhido to (unakee) gardanen maaro yahaan tak ki jab tum unhen zakhmon se choor kar daalo to unakee mushken kas lo phir usake baad ya to ehasaan rakh (kar chhod de) ya muaaveza lekar, yahaan tak ki (dushaman) ladaee ke hathiyaar rakh de to (yaad rakho) agar khuda chaahata to (aur tarah) unase badala leta magar usane chaaha ki tumhaaree aazamaish ek doosare se (ladava kar) kare aur jo log khuda kee raah mein yaheed kiye gae unakee kaaraguzaariyon ko khuda haragiz akaarat na karega
